name: Treasure of the Caribbean
overview: A puzzle game originally designed in 1994 by SNK's 3rd party licensee Face. The prototype was first shown at a show in Japan in September of 1994 but was never released in its original design. The N.C.I./Le Cortex version released in 2011 for the Neo Geo CD is a barely inspired game that only takes 10% of the 1994 prototype.
